analysis.description:
LCToken.openLottery (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#161-242) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balances[msg.sender].lotteryNum >= 0 && balances[msg.sender].lotteryNum <= 9 && balances[msg.sender].indexHash == blockhash[temuint]
	- temuint == balances[msg.sender].lotteryNum

LCToken.account_lock should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#84)
LCToken.account_team should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#86)
LCToken.val1 should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#64-65)
LCToken.val2 should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#65)
LCToken.val3 should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#66-68)
LCToken.val4 should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#69)
LCToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#63-64)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#107-108:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#162-164:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_to' of StandardToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#24) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of StandardToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#24) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#36) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.balanceOfEth (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#40-41) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.balanceOfLockTime (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#44-45) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.balanceOfLotteryNum (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#48-49) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of LCToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#329-330) is not in mixedCase

LCToken.val1 (/unique_chucks/32/0xd9c58ef8afcfe2df9884724de1614205a7b5f3f5.sol#64-65) is never used in LCToken
